attributes.action: Pardon Jack Tweed for assault, he has suffered enough already
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's what Jade would have wanted and we owe it to her to pardon Jack Tweed so that he doesn't face prison

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
